description.title: **SPANISH **Drafty Window Materials
description.body1: **SPANISH **1. Rope Caulk: Seal gaps around windows temporarily(reusable)
description.body2: **SPANISH **2. Caulk: Seal small gaps(e.g. around door and window frames, wall joints, etc.)
description.body3: **SPANISH **3. Caulk Gun: The device used to apply caulk
description.body4: **SPANISH **4. Window Kit: Temporarily insulate windows to block drafts. Use caulk to seal window before installing window kit. Tyz-All Plastic Interior Storms(www.cleanenerygoutlet.org) and Reusable Storm Window Kit (www.amconservation.com)
description.body5: **SPANISH **5. V-seal: Weatherstripping placed around the door frame to block drafts
description.body6: **SPANISH **6. Door Sweep: Blocks drafts at the bottom of doors
description.body7: **SPANISH **7. Foam Weatherstripping: Placed around the door frame to block drafts
description.body8: **SPANISH **8. CFL Bulb: Energy and money saving bulb
description.body9: **SPANISH **9. LED Bulb: The ultimate energy and money saving light bulb
description.body16: **SPANISH **10. High Efficiency Shower Head: Water and money saving shower head
description.body17: **SPANISH **11. Faucet Aerators: Saves water and energy by reducing flow rate and the amount of energy needed to heat water
description.body19: **SPANISH **12. Spray Foam: Fills in large gaps in walls etc.
description.body20: **SPANISH **13. Rigid Foam Insulation/Plywood: Used to seal large air leaks new messages
description.body21: **SPANISH **14. Switch & Outlet Sealer: Insulation placed behind light switch and socket plates
description.body22: **SPANISH **15. Plastic Grocery Bags: Stuff inside of gaps to insulate
